name: Ecommerce Store
description: Welcome to our online haven of style and convenience, where shopping is not just an activity but an experience. Discover a curated selection of premium products that cater to your every need, from fashion-forward apparel to cutting-edge gadgets. With a seamless interface and user-friendly navigation, your perfect find is just a click away.

name: Little Lemon Website
description: This project is a little lemon website where i am trying to implement the concepts of React and Bootstrap. It is the front-end capstone for Meta front-end developer course.
